entry.title: No Thank You - The Unbearable Purposelessness Of Being - 가사

link.title: No Thank You - The Unbearable Purposelessness Of Being - 가사

entry.content:
i've gotten good at kicking bad habits
it's misunderstood as giving up, abandonment
or anything else that i've been accused of
cuz everyone forgets i used to feel love
but not any more, no i buried that weight
cuz the burden weighed more than my body could take
cuz when everybody hurts you it's a smile that you fake
you never know how strong you are until you start to break

i'm twenty something and i'm still alive
self medication is how i get by
still listen to nimrod when i'm getting high
i'm twenty something, i'm doing just fine

so on this anniversary, ten years to date
i think of all my ex lovers and the ones i couldn't save
cuz if i've learned a thing i'm the one who had to change
you can't rely on someone whose problems stay the same
and i've burnt down bridges, broke promises and lied
but i'm good at keeping secrets, hold loyalty up high
and i've got my best friends, try hard to protect them
from what i've become, all fucked up and numb

entry.title: Band 최종호 - 너는 푸르다 (Eng-Radio Edit.) - 가사

link.title: Band 최종호 - 너는 푸르다 (Eng-Radio Edit.) - 가사

entry.content:
I see your candle lights as time passes by
and I’m in a forgotten time.
I wanna run away with you. I wanna fly away to you.

I see your falling tears are drying away
and your Future’s gone away.
I wanna feel your hand in hand. I wanna share your pain in pain.

So I can never forget and never lose our precious memories.
Cause I know your sadness, know worry and know your things of the past.

Even if i’m in quiet, i’m in silence and i’m in closed my mind.
I’m gonna bring back your time, bring back your past,
and bring back things that were.

Anymore! Letn’t go of my hand! Please don’t leave me now!
I know you have no say to sorry, have no say to blame yourself.

Once more! Letn’t me go away! Please don’t leave me now!
We’re in time to live forever. So we’ll come together and love forever.
